content.title: AV Graft Configurations
content.description: Types and configurations of arteriovenous grafts for hemodialysis

key_concepts.details: ePTFE most common; also early-puncture grafts, Vectra, bovine carotid
Brachial artery to forearm vein; loop configuration in forearm
Brachial to axillary or brachial to basilic/cephalic; straight or loop
Femoral artery to femoral vein; consider for upper extremity exhaustion

content.clinical_significance: Grafts offer earlier cannulation but inferior patency to fistulas
